Name: Recompiled Code - Signal
Desc: <color=#3aa4e2>For every 10s</color> remaining, the Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 30%</color> (up to 10 stacks).

Name: Recompiled Code - Signature
Desc: <color=#3aa4e2>For every 10s</color> remaining, the Extra DMG Bonus of Signature Move <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 20%</color> (up to 10 stacks).

Name: Recompiled Code - Enhancement
Desc: <color=#3aa4e2>For every 10s</color> remaining, Extra DMG Bonus <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 10%</color> (up to 10 stacks).

Name: Recompiled Code - Cascade
Desc: <color=#3aa4e2>For every 10s</color> remaining, Basic Attacks recover orbs <color=#3aa4e2>40% faster</color> (up to 10 stacks).

Name: Recompiled Code - Energy
Desc: <color=#3aa4e2>For every 10s</color> remaining, the amount of Signature Energy generated <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 20%</color> (up to 10 stacks).

Name: Recompiled Code - Frail
Desc: <color=#3aa4e2>For every 10s</color> remaining, enemy's Extra DMG Reduction <color=#3aa4e2>decreases by 5%</color> (up to 10 stacks).

Name: Recompiled Code - Synergy
Desc: <color=#3aa4e2>For every 10s</color> remaining, the cooldown of QTE <color=#3aa4e2>decreases by 0.5s</color> (up to 10 stacks).

Name: Recompiled Code - Switch
Desc: <color=#3aa4e2>For every 10s</color> remaining, the cooldown of switching members <color=#3aa4e2>decreases by 0.5s</color> (up to 10 stacks).

Name: Overclock Acceleration - Signal
Desc: Time <color=#bc3e3e>flows 20% faster</color>. The Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 350%</color>.

Name: Overclock Acceleration - Signature
Desc: Time <color=#bc3e3e>flows 20% faster</color>. The Extra DMG Bonus of Signature Move <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 175%</color>.

Name: Overclock Acceleration - Enhancement
Desc: Time <color=#bc3e3e>flows 20% faster</color>. Extra DMG Bonus <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 70%</color>.

Name: Overclock Acceleration - Synergy
Desc: Time <color=#bc3e3e>flows 20% faster</color>. The cooldown of QTE <color=#3aa4e2>decreases by 3s</color>.

Name: Overclock Acceleration - Switch
Desc: Time <color=#bc3e3e>flows 20% faster</color>. The cooldown of switching members <color=#3aa4e2>decreases by 6s</color>.

Name: Overclock Acceleration - Resonance
Desc: Time <color=#bc3e3e>flows 20% faster</color>. The cooldown of switching members/QTE <color=#3aa4e2>decreases by 2s</color>.

Name: Overclock Acceleration - Cascade
Desc: Time <color=#bc3e3e>flows 20% faster</color>. Basic Attacks recover orbs <color=#3aa4e2>250% faster</color>.

Name: Overclock Acceleration - Energy
Desc: Time <color=#bc3e3e>flows 20% faster</color>. The amount of Signature Energy generated <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 50%</color>.

Name: Overclock Acceleration - Frail
Desc: Time <color=#bc3e3e>flows 20% faster</color>. Enemy's Extra DMG Reduction <color=#3aa4e2>decreases by 25%</color>.

Name: Time Contamination - Signal
Desc: 3-Pings remove <color=#bc3e3e>1s</color> of remaining time but has its Extra DMG Bonus <color=#3aa4e2>increased by 350%</color>.

Name: Time Contamination - Signature
Desc: Signature Move removes <color=#bc3e3e>3s</color> of remaining time, but has its Extra DMG Bonus <color=#3aa4e2>increased by 170%</color>.

Name: Time Contamination - Synergy
Desc: QTE removes <color=#bc3e3e>1s</color> of remaining time but increases Extra DMG Bonus by <color=#3aa4e2>30%</color>.

Name: Time Contamination - Switch
Desc: Switching characters removes <color=#bc3e3e>3s</color> of remaining time but increases Extra DMG Bonus by <color=#3aa4e2>30%</color>.

Name: Data Cache - Signal
Desc: 3-Pings increase remaining time by <color=#3aa4e2>1s</color> but has its Extra DMG Bonus <color=#bc3e3e>reduced by 50%</color>.

Name: Data Cache - Signature
Desc: Signature Move increases remaining time by <color=#3aa4e2>3s</color> but has its Extra DMG Bonus <color=#bc3e3e>reduced by 25%</color>.

Name: Data Cache - Synergy
Desc: QTE increases remaining time by <color=#3aa4e2>1s</color> but reduces Extra DMG Bonus by <color=#bc3e3e>15%</color>.

Name: Data Cache - Switch
Desc: Switching characters increases remaining time by <color=#3aa4e2>3s</color> but reduces Extra DMG Bonus by <color=#bc3e3e>15%</color>.

Name: Computation Overload - Signal
Desc: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 300%</color>. For <color=#bc3e3e>every 10s</color> remaining, <color=#bc3e3e>this bonus decreases by 15%</color>.

Name: Computation Overload - Signature
Desc: Signature Move's Extra DMG Bonus <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 200%</color>. For <color=#bc3e3e>every 10s</color> remaining, <color=#bc3e3e>this bonus decreases by 10%</color>.

Name: Computation Overload - Enhancement
Desc: Extra DMG Bonus <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 100%</color>. For <color=#bc3e3e>every 10s</color> remaining, <color=#bc3e3e>this bonus decreases by 5%</color>.

Name: Computation Overload - Switch
Desc: The cooldown of switching character <color=#3aa4e2>decreases by 8s</color>. For <color=#bc3e3e>every 10s</color> remaining, <color=#bc3e3e>this cooldown increases by 0.4s</color>.

Name: Computation Overload - Synergy
Desc: The cooldown of QTE <color=#3aa4e2>decreases by 8s</color>.  For <color=#bc3e3e>every 10s</color> remaining, <color=#bc3e3e>this cooldown increases by 0.4s</color>.

Name: Computation Overload - Cascade
Desc: Get 1 extra set of 3-Ping Orbs <color=#3aa4e2>every 3s</color>. <color=#bc3e3e>For every 10s</color> remaining, this <color=#bc3e3e>interval increases by 1s</color>.

Name: Shard Optimization - Enhancement
Desc: Extra DMG Bonus <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 10%</color>.

Name: Shard Optimization - Expansion
Desc: Remaining time <color=#3aa4e2>increases by 60s</color>.
